title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. A, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 17 - Judicial Education And Training
content:

State Regulations
§ 17.1 - Visitation of facilities and institutions for detention, treatment, examination and confinement; visitation of residential facilities for victims of dome
§ 17.2 - Training and Education of Town and Village Justices and Court Clerks
§ 17.3 - Training and education of judges and justices other than town and village justices
§ 17.4 - Domestic violence program

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. A, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 17

Statutory authority: Constitution, art. VI, § 28[c]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
